newsitem.title: UK: May Syrian Light crude set at Brent -82 cts - trade.
newsitem.headline: May Syrian Light crude set at Brent -82 cts - trade.

text.p: The official selling price (OSP) for loadings of May Syrian Light has been agreed at Dated Brent -82 cents but State oil company Sytrol and lifters of May Souedie crude are still ten cents apart, traders said.
Lifters will pay dated Brent -82 cents for May Syrian Light cargoes, up 13 cents from April's dated -95 cent level.
Discussions on May Souedie liftings were still ten cents apart at Dated -$4.70/-$4.60 a barrel but lifters said the price should be resolved by the end of the week.
The OSP for April Souedie was Dated Brent -$4.70 a barrel.
